summary: The diff adds a <meta name="ic-canister-id" content="xzgjg-tiaaa-aaaal-qndgq-cai" /> tag to frontend/index.html, which partially addresses REQ-1 by embedding the canister ID in the HTML entry point. However, REQ-2 requires changes to dfx.json or equivalent deployment configuration to declare the frontend asset canister with the correct canister ID binding for mainnet â€” no such file was modified in the diff. The project_state.json also shows both AR-1 and AR-2 as still pending, confirming neither requirement is fully implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify and correct the dfx.json or equivalent deployment configuration to ensure the frontend canister (xzgjg-tiaaa-aaaal-qndgq-cai) is properly declared with its canister ID and that the asset canister type and source directories are correctly set for deployment on the IC mainnet.
missing_requirements.reason: No dfx.json or canister IDs configuration file was added or modified in the diff. The deployment configuration for the frontend canister on IC mainnet is not addressed.

hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly states not to change the backend business logic or data schema, yet backend/main.mo appears as a modified file in the diff. No backend changes were requested.
